title: Table 157 - Row 6
clause_text: Sr. No. (1): 3 | Occupancy (2): Assembly and assembly halls or auditorium (including those for educational uses and hostels) | Parking Space required (3): One parking space for 12 seats / persons. Without fixed seats, one parking space for every 15-sq.m of floor area. For canteen, bar and restaurant additional parking required under these Regulations for other permissible users as per provisions made herein for such purposes shall be provided.

values: Assembly and assembly halls or auditorium (including those for educational uses and hostels)

One parking space for 12 seats / persons. Without fixed seats, one parking space for every 15-sq.m of floor area. For canteen, bar and restaurant additional parking required under these Regulations for other permissible users as per provisions made herein for such purposes shall be provided.
